snippet: Verdi’s sweeping and implausible Romantic drama “Ernani” has returned to the Metropolitan Opera and features the American soprano Angela Meade, who has received this year’s Beverly Sills Artist Award.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Verdi opera Ernani, featuring American soprano Angela Meade and Sicilian tenor Roberto De Biasio.
lead_paragraph: Verdi’s sweeping and implausible Romantic drama “Ernani” has returned to the Metropolitan Opera and features the American soprano Angela Meade, who has received this year’s Beverly Sills Artist Award.

headline.seo: Angela Meade in ‘Ernani’ at Metropolitan Opera
headline.main: One Fair Maiden, an Army of Suitors and That Old Foil, Honor
headline.print_headline: One Fair Maiden, an Army of Suitors and That Old Foil, Honor
